content.text: Hey there! How's your day been?
Hey! Not too bad, just spent some time with my kids. I'm a stay at home mom, I also code and design on the side.
Cool! I work in a bank, but I spend most of my free time building models of historical battles.
That's really cool! I've always been interested in history, but I never had the patience to build models.
It's not too hard, and it's a lot of fun! I'm trying to find a place with a big enough room to build a full scale model of the Battle of Waterloo.
That would be amazing! I'd love to see that when it's done.
Thanks! I'll be sure to send you a picture when it's finished.
Awesome! What was your favorite battle?
I think I'd have to say the Battle of Waterloo. It was such a decisive victory, and it changed the course of history.
That's a good one! I'm more of a Civil War buff myself.
Oh cool! I've always been interested in the Civil War, but I don't know much about it.
Well, there's a lot to learn! It was a really bloody and brutal war, but it also led to a lot of important changes in the country.
I'll have to do some reading on it. It sounds really interesting.
It is! I'm sure you'd enjoy it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely check it out
